text: Onru tirattum (marumai) nalukkaka avan unkalai onru tirattum nal atuve, (tiyorai) nastappatuttum nalakum, anal, evar allahvin mitu iman kontu, salihana - nalla - amalkalaic ceykiraro, avarutaiya pavankalai avarai vittum nikki, arukal avarrin kile otik kontirukkum cuvarkkac colaikalilum avan avarai piravecikkac ceyvan; avarril enrenrum irupparkal - itu makattana pakkiyamakum
